content: Yesterday I release the preliminary hacky version of my Lean library crawler at https://github.com/leanprover-community/leancrawler. It's in the community organization so don't hesitate to request push access if you want to make it much better
It's the piece of sofware behind the mathlib quiz and graphs like big_comp.png
(I attached the usable gephi file of that graph somewhere in the quiz thread)
